review: The FireTV has generally been a good device for basic TV viewing.It's under-powered for gaming, *especially* the Fire TV stick (which we also have).The TwitchTV app (Twitch is owned by Amazon) is a terrible version - no search capabilities, no login, etc.The one *big* problem we have is its response to the remote - it turns on the TV and changes the TV's input selection over to the Fire TV input if any button on any remote is touched. This means it turns on/changes input when you move the remote, if the cats touch the remote, etc. This also seems to drain the remote batteries very quickly - presumably because any button press wakes the remote or the remote is always in standby.
author: Jason Maltzen

Please allow me to sort my purchases movies and tv shows by alphabet or genre rather then displaying the video's based on date of purchase (this is a really annoying feature).
